test1.jpg.title: Trimming the Base
test1.jpg.description: Studio lighting captures the precise moment of trimming excess clay from a vessel's base

test2.jpg.title: Initial Centering
test2.jpg.description: Hands working to center clay on the potter's wheel, early stage of vessel formation

test3.jpg.title: Opening the Form
test3.jpg.description: Creating the initial opening in centered clay, beginning the hollow form

test4.jpg.title: Pulling the Walls
test4.jpg.description: Drawing up the vessel walls from the base, defining the form's height

test5.jpg.title: Shaping the Rim
test5.jpg.description: Final refinement of the vessel's rim on the wheel
